snippet: The attackers staged an assault on a police building in the northern city of Kirkuk, and at least 22 people were taken hostage on Wednesday, the authorities said.
abstract: Militants in Iraq attack police building in the northern city of Kirkuk, and at least 22 people are taken hostage.
lead_paragraph: The attackers staged an assault on a police building in the northern city of Kirkuk, and at least 22 people were taken hostage on Wednesday, the authorities said.

headline.main: Militants Attack Iraqi Police, Then Take Hostages
headline.print_headline: Militants Attack Iraqi Police, Then Take Hostages
